english_translation: Narrated by Zayd ibn Ali: When the Imam is in a small number of troops, it is not obligatory upon him to fight the rebellious people. But if his companions number three hundred and some, equal to the people of Badr, then it is obligatory upon him and upon them to fight, and they are not excused from fighting. Indeed, from all deeds there is nothing better than their jihad.

english_translation: Narrated by Ali: It is the right of the imam to rule by what Allah has revealed and to act justly among the subjects. When he does this, it is the right of them to listen and obey, and to answer when called. And any imam who does not rule by what Allah has revealed, there is no obedience for him.
